title: "Pixel Heroes will kill LoL"
body:
all meme'ing aside, it is actually a fun little game, and a streamer i just watched on twitch has an 80% off deal through chrono.gg going for the next 13 hours... i picked it up for a whole $2.

i haven't been this excited for a game in a while, it is actually silly because its so derpy its amazing
